## function_createToast
> **createToast**(`config`?): [`ToastWidget`](#toastwidget)

Defined in: [core/src/components/toast/toast.ts:87](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/toast/toast.ts#L87)

Create a ToastWidget with given config props

### Parameters

#### config?

[`PropsConfig`](../../../../api/react/headless/components/toast/../../types#propsconfig)\<[`ToastProps`](#toastprops)\>

an optional toast config

### Returns

[`ToastWidget`](#toastwidget)

a ToastWidget

## function_getToastDefaultConfig
> **getToastDefaultConfig**(): [`ToastProps`](#toastprops)

Defined in: [core/src/components/toast/toast.ts:78](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/toast/toast.ts#L78)

Retrieve a shallow copy of the default toast config

### Returns

[`ToastProps`](#toastprops)

the default toast config

## interface_ToastApi
Defined in: [core/src/components/toast/toast.ts:52](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/toast/toast.ts#L52)

Represents the API for the toast component.

### Methods

#### close

> **close**(): `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:118](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L118)

Triggers alert closing programmatically (same as clicking on the close button (×)).

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### open

> **open**(): `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:123](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L123)

Triggers the alert to be displayed for the user.

##### Returns

`void`

## interface_ToastDirectives
Defined in: [core/src/components/toast/toast.ts:57](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/toast/toast.ts#L57)

Interface representing the directives for a toast component.

### Properties

#### autoHideDirective

> **autoHideDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/react/headless/components/toast/../../types#directive)

Defined in: [core/src/components/toast/toast.ts:28](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/toast/toast.ts#L28)

Directive that handles the autohide of the toast component

***

#### bodyDirective

> **bodyDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/react/headless/components/toast/../../types#directive)

Defined in: [core/src/components/toast/toast.ts:32](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/toast/toast.ts#L32)

Directive that adds all the necessary attributes to the body

***

#### closeButtonDirective

> **closeButtonDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/react/headless/components/toast/../../types#directive)

Defined in: [core/src/components/toast/toast.ts:36](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/toast/toast.ts#L36)

Directive that adds all the necessary attributes to the close button depending on the presence of the header

***

#### transitionDirective

> **transitionDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/react/headless/components/toast/../../types#directive)

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:133](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L133)

the transition directive, piloting what is the visual effect of going from hidden to visible

## interface_ToastProps
Defined in: [core/src/components/toast/toast.ts:47](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/toast/toast.ts#L47)

Represents the properties for the toast component.

### Properties

#### animated

> **animated**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:108](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L108)

If `true`, alert closing will be animated.

Animation is triggered  when clicked on the close button (×),
via the `.close()` function or the visible prop is changed

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### animatedOnInit

> **animatedOnInit**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:99](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L99)

If `true`, alert opening will be animated.

Animation is triggered  when the `.open()` function is called
or the visible prop is changed

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### ariaCloseButtonLabel

> **ariaCloseButtonLabel**: `string`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:32](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L32)

Accessibility close button label

##### Default Value

`'Close'`

***

#### autoHide

> **autoHide**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/toast/toast.ts:15](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/toast/toast.ts#L15)

If `true` automatically hides the toast after the delay.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

Defined in: [core/src/components/commonProps.ts:10](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/commonProps.ts#L10)

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### delay

> **delay**: `number`

Defined in: [core/src/components/toast/toast.ts:21](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/toast/toast.ts#L21)

Delay in milliseconds before hiding the toast.

##### Default Value

`5000`

***

#### dismissible

> **dismissible**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:19](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L19)

If `true`, alert can be dismissed by the user.
The close button (×) will be displayed and you can be notified of the event with the (close) output.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### onHidden

> **onHidden**: () => `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:67](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L67)

Callback called when the alert is hidden.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onShown

> **onShown**: () => `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:77](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L77)

Callback called when the alert is shown.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onVisibleChange

> **onVisibleChange**: (`visible`) => `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:57](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L57)

Callback called when the alert visibility changed.

##### Parameters

###### visible

`boolean`

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### transition

> **transition**: [`TransitionFn`](../../../../api/react/headless/components/toast/../../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:89](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L89)

The transition function will be executed when the alert is displayed or hidden.

Depending on the value of `animatedOnInit`, the animation can be optionally skipped during the showing process.

##### Default Value

```ts
async () => {}
```

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:25](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L25)

If `true` the alert is visible to the user

##### Default Value

`true`

## interface_ToastState
Defined in: [core/src/components/toast/toast.ts:42](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/toast/toast.ts#L42)

Represents the state of a toast component.

### Properties

#### ariaCloseButtonLabel

> **ariaCloseButtonLabel**: `string`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:32](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L32)

Accessibility close button label

##### Default Value

`'Close'`

***

#### autoHide

> **autoHide**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/toast/toast.ts:15](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/toast/toast.ts#L15)

If `true` automatically hides the toast after the delay.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

Defined in: [core/src/components/commonProps.ts:10](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/commonProps.ts#L10)

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### delay

> **delay**: `number`

Defined in: [core/src/components/toast/toast.ts:21](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/toast/toast.ts#L21)

Delay in milliseconds before hiding the toast.

##### Default Value

`5000`

***

#### dismissible

> **dismissible**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:19](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L19)

If `true`, alert can be dismissed by the user.
The close button (×) will be displayed and you can be notified of the event with the (close) output.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### hidden

> **hidden**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:42](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L42)

Is `true` when the alert is hidden. Compared to `visible`, this is updated after the transition is executed.

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:25](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L25)

If `true` the alert is visible to the user

##### Default Value

`true`

## type alias_ToastWidget
> **ToastWidget**: [`Widget`](../../../../api/react/headless/components/toast/../../types#widget)\<[`ToastProps`](#toastprops), [`ToastState`](#toaststate), [`ToastApi`](#toastapi), [`ToastDirectives`](#toastdirectives)\>

Defined in: [core/src/components/toast/toast.ts:62](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/toast/toast.ts#L62)

Represents a toast widget with specific properties, state, API, and directives.
